abstract: Silverback gorilla known as Ernie, who lives at Bronx Zoo with five females, was carefully chosen for position by Gorilla Species Survival Plan of the Association of Zoos and Aquariums, which matches animals nationwide to create best conditions for procreation; seems content, but question remains as to whether he feels romantic love for any of his partners (Series: Summer Love).
lead_paragraph: Because gorillas live in troops, matching them isn’t just a matter of a male bonding with one female. In the case of Ernie, who lives at the Bronx Zoo, he must get along with Julia, Layla, Tuti, Kumi and Suki.

headline.main: A Gorilla Match (or 5) at the Bronx Zoo
headline.print_headline: Ernie Loves Julia. And Layla. And Tuti and Kumi and Suki.

snippet: Because gorillas live in troops, matching them isn’t just a matter of a male bonding with one female. In the case of Ernie, who lives at the Bronx Zoo, he must get along with Julia, Layla, Tuti, Kumi and Suki.
